argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1z.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | deg1z.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | deg1z.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) |
| 4 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 5 | 1 | #P_deg1fval | |- D = ( 1o mDeg R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 7 | 6, 2, 3 | #P_ply1mpl0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_mdeg0 | |- ( ( 1o e. On /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( D ` .0. ) = -oo ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpan | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( D ` .0. ) = -oo ) |
